name: then-request
description: A request library that returns promises, inspired by request

scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:full && npm run build:min
scripts.build:full: browserify -d --standalone request lib/browser.js | exorcist -u request.js.map dist/request.js.map > dist/request.js
scripts.build:min: browserify -d --standalone request lib/browser.js -p [minifyify --compressPath . --map request.min.js.map --output dist/request.min.js.map] > dist/request.min.js

author: ForbesLindesay
